wear off.translation[0].definitions[0].d: if pain or the effect of something wears off, it gradually stops
wear off.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The effects of the anaesthetic were starting to wear off.
wear off.translation[0].definitions[1].d: used to say that you stop feeling interested or excited about something because it is no longer new
wear off.translation[0].definitions[1].e: It was funny for a while but the novelty soon wore off.
